TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MsgBoxStyle extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates which buttons to display when calling the `MsgBox` function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When you call the `MsgBox` function, you can use the `MsgBoxStyle` enumeration in your code in place of the actual values. The argument takes the `MsgBoxStyle` enumeration members.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.MsgBoxStyle AbortRetryIgnore = int32(2)

Docs.summary: **Abort**, **Retry**, and **Ignore** buttons. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbAbortRetryIgnore`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.MsgBoxStyle ApplicationModal = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Application modal message box. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbApplicationModal`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.MsgBoxStyle Critical = int32(16)

Docs.summary: Critical message. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbCritical`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.MsgBoxStyle DefaultButton1 = int32(0)

Docs.summary: First button is default. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbDefaultButton1`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.MsgBoxStyle DefaultButton2 = int32(256)

Docs.summary: Second button is default. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbDefaultButton2`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.MsgBoxStyle DefaultButton3 = int32(512)

Docs.summary: Third button is default. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbDefaultButton3`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.MsgBoxStyle Exclamation = int32(48)

Docs.summary: Warning message. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbExclamation`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.MsgBoxStyle Information = int32(64)

Docs.summary: Information message. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbInformation`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.MsgBoxStyle MsgBoxHelp = int32(16384)

Docs.summary: Help text. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbMsgBoxHelp`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.MsgBoxStyle MsgBoxRight = int32(524288)

Docs.summary: Right-aligned text. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbMsgBoxRight`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.MsgBoxStyle MsgBoxRtlReading = int32(1048576)

Docs.summary: Right-to-left reading text (Hebrew and Arabic systems). This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbMsgBoxRtlReading`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.MsgBoxStyle MsgBoxSetForeground = int32(65536)

Docs.summary: Foreground message box window. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbMsgBoxSetForeground`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.MsgBoxStyle OkCancel = int32(1)

Docs.summary: **OK** and **Cancel** buttons. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbOKCancel`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.MsgBoxStyle OkOnly = int32(0)

Docs.summary: **OK** button only (default). This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbOKOnly`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.MsgBoxStyle Question = int32(32)

Docs.summary: Warning query. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbQuestion`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.MsgBoxStyle RetryCancel = int32(5)

Docs.summary: **Retry** and **Cancel** buttons. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbRetryCancel`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.MsgBoxStyle SystemModal = int32(4096)

Docs.summary: System modal message box. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbSystemModal`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.MsgBoxStyle YesNo = int32(4)

Docs.summary: **Yes** and **No** buttons. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbYesNo`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.MsgBoxStyle YesNoCancel = int32(3)

Docs.summary: **Yes**, **No**, and **Cancel** buttons. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbYesNoCancel`.
